long_description: The 6-speed Diamondback Lustre 20 in. kids' bike delivers sturdy, capable performance and comes with a shock-absorbing front fork and tough aluminum frame. Frame is constructed out of heat-treated aluminum for durable performance; sloped top tube accommodates a kid-appropriate stand-over height. Trail XC suspension fork offers 30mm of travel to smooth out rough roads and take the jolts out of bumps and roots on the trail. Chain ring guard helps protect clothing from getting caught in the crankset. Shimano Revo twist shifters are easy to use-simply twist the grip-integrated shifters to change gears. Linear-pull brakes supply sure stopping power and speed management; brake levers are sized for small hands. The rear derailleur hanger, a part that is particularly vulnerable to breakage from young riders, can be easily replaced, and extends the usable life of the frame. Specs are subject to change.
short_description: The 6-speed Diamondback Lustre 20 in. kids' bike delivers sturdy, capable performance and comes with a shock-absorbing front fork and tough aluminum frame.
